scenario_text.value:
(It seemed so spacious at first, but with
this many people it still feels cramped.)

(And I didn’t realize how high up it goes.
Maybe I’d better not look down...)
Wow! We’re up so high!
Woohoo!
Ooh, let me look, too!

Hey, we’re not out here for the fun of it!
Try to stay alert!

Oh, relax, Shuuji. We’re practically there,
what’s the harm in having a little fun?
But... But...

Disaster could strike at any moment. We must
remain vigilant.

Oh, you’re so strict. Don’t you get tired
being on high alert all the time?
I... I hate heights.

Heheh, it’s all right, everyone. We’re almost
there.

When we get to the tower, our cell phones
should work. Then we can call for help.

And this whole wilderness survival nightmare
will finally be over.
Yes, soon it will ALL be over.
Uh...what?

Um, is the radio tower is up and running?
You didn’t stick around there, so could it be...
Is it indeed? Heheheh...
Huh? What do you—?

If you want something done right, I suppose
you must do it yourself...
Huh? D-did you just...?

You know, I really am very grateful to all of
you. I feel like I should thank you.

Oh, don’t mention it. Honestly, I’m not even
sure why you’d feel that way.

Why, because even if that one little brat got
away, now you’re all here instead.

And there are so many of you... I can’t thank
you enough.
Wh-what’s gotten into you?
I don’t get it...

Heheh, don’t worry. I’ll be sure to catch
your other little friend, too.
M-Mommy?

Although, I suppose this is the end of the
line for you.
Waaah?!
Aaaugh?!
Ugh, ow!

(What was that?! Why did we start swinging?!
The sudden motion knocked us all around...)
Rrk... Is everyone okay?
What happened?!
Ugh, I feel dizzy...
I hit my head...
It seems like...nobody has any major injuries.

Uh, is it just me, or does something seem...
wrong?
The car... It’s not moving.

(I don’t like this. A minute ago, everything
was going great. Now it’s too quiet.)
Huh? That woman... She’s gone!
What? Seriously?!
Huh?!
Yyyeah...

(An instinctive terror started to spread over
me, like a horrible revelation.)
Ryo... B-b-behind you...
Wha...?

(Something was out there, staring in at us
through the window...)

(Its eyes glittering like a predator eager to
devour its prey.)
...Eek!

(Trapped inside the cable car, we could do
little more than scream.)
Waaaaaaaaah!!!
A spider?! Again?!

What is that thing?! A demon?! A demon spider
woman?!
Oh no, no, no, no, no!
It’s huge!

Where’d this monster even come from?! And...
what happened to that woman?

Not very bright, are you? Or was my disguise
just that good?

Don’t you know better than to trust
a stranger?
She’s...smiling.
So creepy...

I am Arukenimon. But don’t worry, you won’t
need to remember my name for long.
Because you’re all about to die!
Eek!

Yes, I will offer up everyone in this box as
sacrifices.
Oh no! What are we going to do? Shuuji?!

This is why I didn’t want to go exploring!
Waaah! Yaaah!
Aaaugh! I’m scared!

Oh, shut up, you little crybaby! Can’t you
think of something?!
No... No... Mommy...

That’s not... That’s not my mommy... Of
course not. Haha, of course not...
Mommy’s not here...
